formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu diesem AMI-Befehl in Asterisk 1.6:

para.screen: Action: DAHDIShowChannels Synopsis: Show status DAHDI channels Privilege: <none>

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 () zu 1.4 ():
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 () zu 1.6:

para.screen: --- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -1,3 +1,3 @@ - Action: ZapShowChannels - Synopsis: Show status zapata channels + Action: DAHDIShowChannels + Synopsis: Show status DAHDI channels Privilege: <none>
